issues: Major semantic conflict: Sample asserted as stream water but coordinates locate it in deciduous broadleaf forest biome
Elevation discrepancy: 23.1m difference between asserted (271.9m) and geospatial (295.0m)
Environmental context mismatch: Stream sample metadata vs forest land cover classification
Missing ecosystem and ecosystem_category fields for GOLD pathway classification
Nearest water feature (Leach Run) is 147.4m away, raising questions about sample origin
recommendations: Verify sample collection coordinates - current coordinates appear to be in forested area rather than stream
Cross-reference field notes to confirm sample was collected from Posey Creek vs nearby Leach Run
Consider updating coordinates to reflect actual stream sampling location
Add ecosystem and ecosystem_category fields to complete GOLD pathway metadata
Validate elevation measurement against topographic maps for the actual sampling site
Include distance to nearest water body in metadata to clarify spatial context
